verses.text: <div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" sID="pv20"/><title canonical="true" type="psalm"><w lemma="strong:H04210">A Psalm</w> <w lemma="strong:H01732">of David</w>.</title><div type="x-milestone" subType="x-preverse" eID="pv20"/><w lemma="strong:H03068">The <divineName>Lord</divineName></w> <transChange type="added">is</transChange> <w lemma="strong:H07462" morph="strongMorph:TH8802">my shepherd</w>; <w lemma="strong:H02637" morph="strongMorph:TH8799">I shall not want</w>.

<w lemma="strong:H07257" morph="strongMorph:TH8686">He maketh me to lie down</w> <w lemma="strong:H01877">in green</w> <w lemma="strong:H04999">pastures</w>: <w lemma="strong:H05095" morph="strongMorph:TH8762">he leadeth</w> <w lemma="strong:H04496">me beside the still</w> <w lemma="strong:H04325">waters</w>.<note type="study"><catchWord>green…</catchWord>: Heb. <rdg type="x-literal">pastures of tender grass</rdg></note><note type="study"><catchWord>still…</catchWord>: Heb. <rdg type="x-literal">waters of quietness</rdg></note>

<w lemma="strong:H07725" morph="strongMorph:TH8787">He restoreth</w> <w lemma="strong:H05315">my soul</w>: <w lemma="strong:H05148" morph="strongMorph:TH8686">he leadeth</w> <w lemma="strong:H04570">me in the paths</w> <w lemma="strong:H06664">of righteousness</w> <w lemma="strong:H08034">for his name’s</w> sake.

<w lemma="strong:H03212" morph="strongMorph:TH8799">Yea, though I walk</w> <w lemma="strong:H01516">through the valley</w> <w lemma="strong:H06757">of the shadow of death</w>, <w lemma="strong:H03372" morph="strongMorph:TH8799">I will fear</w> <w lemma="strong:H07451">no evil</w>: for thou <transChange type="added">art</transChange> <w lemma="strong:H07626">with me; thy rod</w> <w lemma="strong:H04938">and thy staff</w> <w lemma="strong:H05162" morph="strongMorph:TH8762">they comfort</w> me.

<w lemma="strong:H06186" morph="strongMorph:TH8799">Thou preparest</w> <w lemma="strong:H07979">a table</w> <w lemma="strong:H06440">before</w> <w lemma="strong:H06887" morph="strongMorph:TH8802">me in the presence of mine enemies</w>: <w lemma="strong:H01878" morph="strongMorph:TH8765">thou anointest</w> <w lemma="strong:H07218">my head</w> <w lemma="strong:H08081">with oil</w>; <w lemma="strong:H03563">my cup</w> <w lemma="strong:H07310">runneth over</w>.<note type="study"><catchWord>anointest</catchWord>: Heb. <rdg type="x-literal">makest fat</rdg></note>

<w lemma="strong:H02896">Surely goodness</w> <w lemma="strong:H02617">and mercy</w> <w lemma="strong:H07291" morph="strongMorph:TH8799">shall follow</w> <w lemma="strong:H03117">me all the days</w> <w lemma="strong:H02416">of my life</w>: <w lemma="strong:H03427" morph="strongMorph:TH8804">and I will dwell</w> <w lemma="strong:H01004">in the house</w> <w lemma="strong:H03068">of the <divineName>Lord</divineName></w> <w lemma="strong:H03117 strong:H0753">for ever</w>.<note type="study"><catchWord>for ever</catchWord>: Heb. <rdg type="x-literal">to length of days</rdg></note> <chapter chapterTitle="PSALM 23." eID="gen520" osisID="Ps.23"/>
